data.title: Sign In to PlayStation Network
data.meta_description: PlayStation®4 Official User's Guide. Explains how to use the PS4™ system.
data.text:
To sign in to PlayStation™Network, select (Settings) > [Account Management] > [Sign In to PlayStation Network].

For details on PlayStation™Network, see âPlayStation™Networkâ.

Using an account that has been created on another device

You can use an account that's been created on the web or on a device such as your PS Vita system.

You'll need to enter your sign-in ID (email address) and password, and then select [Sign In].

Creating a new account

Select [New to PlayStation™Network? Create an Account], and then follow the on-screen instructions to create a new account.
